name: Git The Kraken
description:
Description:

GitKraken, is releasing the Kraken on to the world but first it must collect as many commits it can. The Kraken will ride sea creatures out of the endless ocean of space gathering commits as it goes. Let's see how far you can get the Kraken!

Post your high score as a reply to the tweet linked below!

Controls:

Use left click or space to jump!

Supports double jump.

Made for a GitKraken competition.

Check out the twitter post and give it a like if you liked the game!

https://twitter.com/aaranos/status/719356097132392...

Unfortunately, Unity webGL has some issues with URLs so the Vote button in the game does not work. Works fine on standalone.
